article: at a victory celebration saturday that has become the hallmark of his unk rebellion against president mobutu sese seko , rebel leader laurent kabila told a cheering crowd he would press on to the capital , kinshasa .
abstract: with zaire rebel leader says goal is to march to kinshasa
